synopsis:
Jiang City famous business elite Ji Junyang was framed by the enemy and was blinded in a car accident. When he was on the verge of collapse, there was a young mysterious woman showed up. She helped him recover while he fell in love with her generally. But he didn't know the woman's name and called her "HONEY" On the first day of regaining the light, she suddenly disappeared, and Ji Junyang was angry and puzzled. He vowed to find her and ask her to come back.

(Source: Official Youtube Video)
